fix: resolve Cognito sub to DB user ID in auth middleware

JWT auth was storing the Cognito sub claim directly as userID in context,
causing FK violations against todos.user_id \(which references users.id UUID\).
Now the middleware resolves sub → users.id via UserResolver interface.

- Add UserResolver interface \(ResolveUserID\) with ErrUserNotFound sentinel
- Distinguish not-found \(401\) from DB errors \(500\) in handleJWT
- Add constructor validation for required deps in JWT mode
- Wire userResolverAdapter in main.go to bridge repository → middleware

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
